answers.answer: Talk to your doc ASAP. Might be something along the lines of diabetes, which could go away or stay after birth..

Sounds like diabetes. My mother and 2 grandmothers are diabetic. My moms showed up when she was pregnant with my little brother she fainted in Wal mart and that's how they figured out it was diabetes. U need to request a diabetes test ASAP!!

question: Ok. I'm 12w 4d and for the past week, I have been feeling VERY thirsty. I feel like I am dehydrated but I know I'm not because I drink about 30-40 ounces of water every hour. But no matter how much I drink I feel thirsty. I ended up fainting at work and being rushed to the ER and all the did was pump me with saline. They said it looked like I was dehydrated but I wasn't so they didn't know what was wrong with me. This just doesn't make any sense to me!!! Please somebody, anybody. I hate this feeling!
title: I don't know what's wrong with me!
